hero.title: Guiding Students to Confident Success
hero.subtitle: Conor by FCEDU supports learners with proven coaching, caring mentors, and a community that believes in every student.

valueProps.title: Experienced Educators
valueProps.desc: Our coaches bring classroom expertise and real-world empathy.

valueProps.title: Personalized Guidance
valueProps.desc: Tailored study plans and one-on-one check-ins keep progress on track.

valueProps.title: Community & Parents
valueProps.desc: Transparent updates, workshops, and support beyond the classroom.

about.mission: We help students build confidence and skills through structured coaching, modern tools, and human warmth.

programs.title: Programs
programs.subtitle: From foundational skills to exam readiness — clear milestones, caring guidance.
